direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your hair. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's getting really shaggy. Scott's HAT appears on his head! He looks totally freked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I like it. Knives removes the hat from Scott's head, literally taking his guard down. Ramona sees this and smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You do? Scott smiles, then realizes Ramona has gone. He turns to see her, pulling her hood up and walking into the darkness. Scott calls after her. Steps tentatively away from Knives.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey... Where are you going? Ramona, hoping to slip away, stops and turns back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I dunno. I should probably disappear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After all that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's hard, you know? I came here to get away, but the past keeps catching up. I'm tired of people getting hurt because of me. Ramona looks at Knives as she says this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think I understand. Snow begins to fall. Ramona straightens his parka tenderly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I should tahnk you, though.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For being the nicest guy I ever dated. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's kind of sad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is kind of sad. She takes his hand briefly, then lets it drop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well... Bye and stuff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. And stuff. She turns to walk off again. Scott watches, then hears-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Go get her. Surprised, Scott turns back to see a smiling Knives.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wha?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You earned it. You've been fighting for her all along.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But what about you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (totally sweet and sad) I'll be fine. I'm too cool for you anyway. She grins and kisses his cheek.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's someone out there for me. We hear a COUGH - Young Neil sidles into frame behind her. Guitar still in hand. We hear a 2ND COUGH - Nega Scott also sidles into frame. Knives doesn't look back, but urges Scott to-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go talk to her. Before she's gone. Ramona walks on into the night alone, but then-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Hey... mind if I tag along? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ramona is flabbergasted to see a cheery Scott walk alongside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want to come with me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought maybe we could... try again? Ramona smiles. She holds out her hand like in the park scene earlier. Scott takes it. We see the door with the star on it, standing right in the middle of the street, snow swirling around it. Scott and Ramona walk towards the door, sunrise coming up over Toronto, night magically turning to day, winter turning to spring. Over this magical transformation, we hear a lush rendition of
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ramona' swelling and hear whispers of gossip over Toronto's cell phone airwaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Oh my God, can I blow your mind? Scott Pilgrim totally threw down with Gideon Graves at the grand opening of Chaos Theater. Yeah, it was apparently awesome.
direction.name: direction
